description:
Lugares de interés: Dunkin' Donuts, Atlantic Avenue, Essence Bar & Restaurant, y Key Food. Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a la cocina, el espacio acogedor, y la ubicación.

The place: is a new apartment, all renovated in a great neighborhood in Brooklyn. Everything in the apartment is new, you will have full access to the kitchen, fridge etc, and we have a backyard if you like to drink your coffee outside in the morning before taking the train to Manhattan. The station is 3 blocks away, plenty of food around.

Kitchen, dining room, bathroom, backyard
Cleaning service

I don't live at this place anymore since my family grew we had to move, but I now live 3 blocks away and I'm available between 10 am to 10 pm

The C train is 3 blocks away, on Ralph Av, the Express A train, is on Utica Av 5 blocks away from the train. Also a Lyft or Uber from the airport is not expensive and there are million buses around if you need to move within the area
name: BRK Perfect room in modern apartment
review: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
